resources.string: Your location-related information can be sent to Google and your operator in order to establish Wi-Fi calls.
Use Wi-Fi networks to make and receive calls anywhere in metropolitan France, without connecting to a mobile network.
To use the service, check that it is offered by your service provider, enable it in Call settings, then connect to a Wi-Fi network. The icon below will be shown whenever this function is available.

Use Wi-Fi networks to make and receive calls anywhere in metropolitan France, without connecting to a mobile network.
